name: OnlineSearch
description:
Description

Find balloons hidden by other players

Controls Read
  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • LEFT SHIFT to run
  • LEFT CONTROL to dash
  • E to pickup an orange object
  • Q to place balloon while hidding
  • R to restart searching or hiding a balloon
  • Escape to open the pause menu while hiding or searching
Info

if you have an older version the game will just crash when trying to connect so make sure you have the latest one
